name: Tag Strategies
description:
Tag Strategies (formerly Price Communications) is a strategic brand development firm that helps brands thrive beyond expectation. Tag offers the area's only Certified Brand Strategist and proprietary process that takes businesses out of the sea of sameness to make meaningful emotional connections with customers, prospects and constituents. Bottom line, we build brand value.
Our core competencies include brand strategy, creative development, marketing plans, online and offline media/advertising campaigns, collateral, packaging, direct marketing and web design. We have a zest for life, sunny-side-up-attitudes and get out of bed every day looking forward to what “it” can be. At Tag, you're it. (And mean that every sense.)
READ MORE...
